About Me

Hello, My name is Sanskar Ghimire ,a curious soul with a passion for exploring both the digital world around me and the depths of my own imagination.

Originally from a small town in Tanahun District, I grew up surrounded by the tranquility of nature and the warmth of close-knit communities. This upbringing instilled in me a deep appreciation for simplicity, kindness, and the beauty of life's small moments.

Thank you for taking the time to learn a bit about me. I look forward to connecting with fellow adventurers and kindred spirits on this journey called life.
